page.title: 20PRIMARY SCHOOL,BARNSTAPLE.
page.content: {Sticklepath school}opened on 24th Feb 1953,on the first day there were 124 children.When it was at its biggest there were{450 children,}there are now 403.{14 teachers}work here and the longest serving teacher is Mrs West who has been here for 14 years and started in 1957.Altogether we have had 3 head teachers.There are{15 {classrooms}in our school and 6 of them are temporary huts.The school has a swimming pool and runs several clubs such as football,cricket,netball, athletics,chess,needlework,dance and natural history.{School dinners}cost 57p per day and on average 110 children have school dinners daily.We have one caretaker and 3 cleaners,6 mealtime assistants and 3 kitchen staff and also a secretary.When children leave at 11 they go to one of two{comprehensives}in the town.
